name: Viral Mutation Manipulation Simulation
description:
How does running a robotic virus factory sound to you?
Here's your chance to find out.

-- Objectives --

  • Combine viral strains together to form more potent viruses.
  • Experiment with the effects on the test subject

-- Controls --

  • LMB : Inspect resource/machine, Interact with the user interface.
  • RMB : Close all inspector menus
  • C: Cargo zone buildmode
  • 1: Duplicator buildmode
  • 2: Mixer buildmode
  • 3: Shifter buildmode

(Click under the screen to gain window focus for key input)

-- Developer's comments --

Not finished, polished or even winnable. A prototype of sorts.

Started out as a LD32 entry, Jam Post Mortem

-- Release Notes --

- V.0.33 Adds drag and drop + other interface improvements - 24.4.2015 : 21.50
- V.0.35 Gene Shifter + completely mouse driven interface - 07.5.2015 : 21.00
